tool_description: Generates comprehensive booking recommendations by combining venue demographics, audience preferences, availability, revenue potential, and competitive analysis into ranked venue suggestions.

candidate_venues.description: List of venues being considered for booking

demographic_scores.description: Demographic match scores for each venue (0-100)

revenue_projections.description: Revenue projections for each venue in dollars

availability_windows.description: Available booking windows for each venue

competition_levels.description: Competition intensity scores for each venue (0-100)

performance_history_scores.description: Historical performance success scores at each venue (0-100)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All venue-related arrays must have the same length as candidate_venues.
Invalid score values: All scores must be between 0 and 100.
Invalid weight values: All priority weights must be between 0 and 1.
Weight sum error: All priority weights should sum to approximately 1.0.
Empty venue list: At least one candidate venue must be provided.
Invalid revenue values: Revenue projections must be non-negative numbers.
usage: Input candidate venues with corresponding scores and projections from other analysis tools. Adjust priority weights to customize recommendation criteria. Receive ranked venue recommendations with detailed justifications.

ranked_venues.description: Venues ranked by overall recommendation score

recommendation_scores.description: Overall recommendation scores for each ranked venue (0-100)

top_venue_justification.description: Detailed explanation for top venue recommendation

risk_assessments.description: Risk factors identified for each recommended venue

booking_priority_order.description: Suggested order for approaching venues for booking
